data.comment: The big names in today's match at BayArena have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Hoffenheim have kicked-off.
In the minute 1, Hoffenheim's Florian Grillitsch attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Goal! Leon Bailey gives Leverkusen a 1-0 lead in Leverkusen.
That's a fine assist from Nadiem Amiri.
In the minute 7, Leverkusen's Leon Bailey gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at BayArena.
In the minute 10, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
Leverkusen needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 15, Martin Petersen signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at BayArena.
Martin Petersen awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Free kick Leverkusen.
Leverkusen are pushing forward but Patrik Schick's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 21, Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Leverkusen.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 24, Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Martin Petersen awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Hoffenheim!
In the minute 27, Leon Bailey puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim attack but Stefan Posch's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leverkusen.
Moussa Diaby (Leverkusen) has received a yellow card from Martin Petersen.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of Leverkusen.
Daley Sinkgraven (Leverkusen) has received a first yellow card.
In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Florian Wirtz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leverkusen.
In the minute 45, Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at BayArena.
The second-half has commenced. Leverkusen with the kick-off.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's first substitution at BayArena with Robert Skov replacing Sebastian Rudy.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Leverkusen.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 47, Martin Petersen signals a throw-in for Hoffenheim, close to Leverkusen's area.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 49, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
In the minute 50, Hoffenheim are back in the match in Leverkusen. Christoph Baumgartner has scored to make it 2-1.
Ryan Sessegnon instrumental with a fine assist.
In Leverkusen, Leverkusen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Leverkusen pushes forward through Moussa Diaby, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 54, In Leverkusen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Leverkusen extend their lead to 3-1 through Florian Wirtz.
Patrik Schick with an assist there.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at BayArena.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Stefan Posch for Hoffenheim has been booked by Martin Petersen and receives a first yellow card.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a second substitution, with Ishak Belfodil replacing Ihlas Bebou.
Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Leverkusen drives forward and Leon Bailey gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Martin Petersen signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Leverkusen's half.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Nadiem Amiri for Leverkusen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Martin Petersen awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Free kick Leverkusen.
In the minute 64, Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Wendell is replacing Daley Sinkgraven for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 66, Leverkusen make their second substitution with Lucas Alario replacing Patrik Schick.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leverkusen.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Martin Petersen.
Leverkusen advance rapidly upfield but Martin Petersen blows for offside.
In the minute 71, Hoffenheim drive forward but Ishak Belfodil is judged offside.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Kevin Vogt is booked for the away team.
In the minute 74, Leverkusen's Nadiem Amiri has been booked in Leverkusen.
In the minute 75, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Leverkusen territory.
The home team have replaced Lars Bender with Mitchell Weiser. This is the third substitution made today by Peter Bosz.
Peter Bosz (Leverkusen) is making a fourth substitution, with Karim Bellarabi replacing Leon Bailey.
The away team replace Christoph Baumgartner with Mijat Gacinovic.
Kevin Akpoguma is replacing Andrej Kramaric for the away team.
In the minute 77, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Leverkusen push upfield but Martin Petersen quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 78, Martin Petersen signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at BayArena.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Hoffenheim.
He's off! Stefan Posch is shown a second yellow card.
At BayArena, Leverkusen are penalized for being offside.
Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Martin Petersen signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Peter Bosz is making the team's fifth substitution at BayArena with Aleksandar Dragovic replacing Julian Baumgartlinger.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen's Florian Wirtz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, Melayro Bogarde is replacing Diadie Samassekou for Hoffenheim at BayArena.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 89, Leverkusen's Florian Wirtz is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Penalty! Martin Petersen points to the spot, great chance for Leverkusen...
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-1.
At BayArena, Havard Nordtveit has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Leverkusen are going well in Leverkusen. They now lead 4-1 thanks to a Lucas Alario penalty.
